info.name: Honeycomb RESTCONF calls for NSH_SFC
info.description: Common mgmt operations on VPP using Honeycomb REST interface

item.name: 3_Add nsh-map from SFF2 to Egress - cfg
1_Delete nsh-map from SFF2 to Egress - cfg

request.description:
Adds classify table1. Corresponding vpp cli command:

vppctl classify table mask l2 src

To verify invoke:

vppctl sh class table verbose

or:

vat# classify_table_info table_id 1

Adds classify session to table0. Corresponding vpp cli command:

vppctl classify session acl-hit-next deny opaque-index 0 table-index 0 match l2 src 01:02:03:04:05:06

To verify invoke:

vppctl sh class table verbose

Creates bridgfe domain. Corresponds to invoking:

vat#  bridge_domain_add_del bd_id [bd_id] learn 0 forward 0 uu-flood 0 flood 1 arp-term 0

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Adds l2 interconnection of bridge-based type to local0 interface.
Corresponds to the following command:

vppctl set interface l2 bridge local0 [bd_id]

To verify invoke:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Enables L2 and Ipv4 ACL on local0. Corresponding vpp cli commands:

set int input acl intfc local0 l2-table 0

set int input acl intfc local0 ip4-table 0

To verify invoke:

vppctl show inacl type l2

then:

vppctl show inacl type ip4

item.name: 6_Add vxlan-gpe from Classifier to SFF - cfg
7_Add nsh-entry from Classifier to SFF - cfg
8_Add nsh-map from Classifier to SFF - cfg
1_Delete nsh-map from SF to SFF2 - cfg

request.description:
Enables L2 and Ipv4 ACL on local0. Corresponding vpp cli commands:

set int input acl intfc local0 l2-table 0

set int input acl intfc local0 ip4-table 0

To verify invoke:

vppctl show inacl type l2

then:

vppctl show inacl type ip4

Removes l2 interconnection of bridge-based type from local0 interface.
Corresponds to the following VAT command:

vat# sw_interface_set_l2_bridge sw_if_index 0 bd_id 1 disable

Verification in VAT:

vat# bridge_domain_dump

Creates bridgfe domain. Corresponds to invoking:

vat#  bridge_domain_add_del bd_id [bd_id] learn 0 forward 0 uu-flood 0 flood 1 arp-term 0

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Adds classify session to table0. Corresponding vpp cli command:

vppctl classify session acl-hit-next deny opaque-index 0 table-index 0 match l2 src 01:02:03:04:05:06

To verify invoke:

vppctl sh class table verbose

Adds classify table1. Corresponding vpp cli command:

vppctl classify table mask l2 src

To verify invoke:

vppctl sh class table verbose

or:

vat# classify_table_info table_id 1
